name: Senzo
wishText: Hope you enjoy a mix blend of CSS, Html and Java ;)
text4: Ngoba ubalulekile (futhi bengifuna ukubona ukuthi ngiyakwazi)
text5Content: Sifuna ukukuficela inxaxa kuyoyonke into oyenzayo ngendlela engajwayelekile
wishHeading: Happy Birthday! i hope you had a great day, and we wish you many more years to come!!!
outroText: Okay, seningangitschela ukuthi ngiyenze kanjani?(got help online)
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
